attributes.title: 𝐷𝑖𝑠𝑔𝑢𝑠𝑡𝑖𝑛𝑔
attributes.review: the fact that our own president needs to make an app to get more votes is disgusting. he obviously knows that Gen Z has gotten way too far and can do whatever they want to the economy and this role as president. #bantrump2020 #genz #2020genz We can do this guys. Apple Store please take this away. Universe please take away his privilege.

attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting
attributes.userName: trump is a W a s t e ✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: The app made me physically throw up the food I had eaten less than 5 minutes ago and showed absolutely horrific photos of a pig on the opening of the app. extremely disappointed Will not be back anytime soon. The creater really needs to think about their life decisions

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: The app started loading and taking so long, either it needs another platform to go to, or this app is messed up, I’ve been here for 15 minutes now, waiting for it to open up, and I just can’t find a solution to the problem, please fix it.

attributes.title: BYE
attributes.review: when i opened the app my phone got very hot and the app started screaming really rude things to me 😿😿 it told me to go jump off a roof and many other things. one star very terrible. not to mention it also smells so bad. it made my phone stink. 😿😿😿 if i could i would give it zero stars. terrible app do not get.

This app is absolutely awful and it made me throw up profusely as soon as I opened it up. I was sick for weeks and not to mention it’s all about this rapist who’s also racist af.🤮 it’s just all around terrible and I think it should be taken off the App Store all together on all platforms for that matter.

attributes.title: SHOULD BE RATED R
attributes.review: I downloaded this app as I am a high priest in the church of our lord and savior cheeto dust and when I opened it there were naked Cheetos EVERYWHERE not only that but it changed every picture in my camera roll to a different naked Cheeto doing unspeakable things. Will be RESIGNING from my position and can only hope our president will do the same

attributes.title: ABSOLUTLY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: if I could give this app under one star I would. super offensive and one sided. bad glitches and too many adds. It give my whole phone glitches and after I purchased it my screen wouldn’t work whil I went on the app. WAY TOO MANY NOTIFICATIOSN. I think apple should take this app off the app store immediately

attributes.title: Tragedy 💂🏾‍♂️😔
attributes.review: Sir Apple, I am pained to announce that this app has simply RUINED my sanity. I’m allergic to look at the colors red and blue, and this insensitive app neglected those with my disability and doesn’t even have a monochrome setting. I’m traumatized, my eyes and anus are currently bleeding, and I don’t think I’ll ever be able to forget the tragedy that took place on this day.

attributes.title: Depression
attributes.review: this app is horrible for everyone. It helps no one. The only people that think it is fine is mentally insane. when I opened it it crashed and you try to convert me into a racist person, I would never. then I went to a tab and it was truly homophobic I hated it. Never get this app. NEVER get this.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is beyond disgusting I was disturbed by a picture of a naked Cheeto getting a spray tan and seeing a Cheeto working out this app stole my McNuggets and then my Dino nuggets and then my smiley fries
